name: Safavieh_Skyler_Taupe_Headboard_(Queen)
reviews: The lines of the bed are beautiful. The color grey would have been more descriptive. The picture should have reflected the bright chrome nail heads a the lighting showing the color is closer to charcoal grey, rather than taupe which is described as grey with a touch of brown. Because of the lines I thought of keeping and having upholstered in cream linen with dull, antiqued brass nail heads. Safavieh, please do this headboard in other colors & nail heads.

This is a great headboard. Loved the color, price, fabric. However, upon opening the bottom half of the headboard was covered in pulls - like a kitten had used it as a scratching board - is the only way I can describe. It was WAY too much trouble to send back so I hid it with a lot of pillows. Beautiful & priced right. But regardless of what you spend, it should never show up damaged.

My daughter's bed is nice but it never looked really finished without a headboard. This headboard easily bolted on to the metal frame she already had. The taupe is in the mid-color range I would expect and the cloth has a nice texture to it. It will go with a variety of bedding styles, including the linen duvet on it now.
Beautiful headboard. Definitely light grey. Goes great with my room!
description: Luxurious embellishments make the queen-sized Skyler taupe headboard the star of a transitional or traditional bedroom.  Exquisitely upholstered with pure linen on an artfully upholstered scalloped frame, its silhouette is outlined with dazzling silver nailheads. The neutral taupe color allows for the plush upholstered headboard to blend with most decor, and the fine linen fabric is soft to the touch. Bring an elegant flair to any sleeping chamber and relax in palatial style and comfort.Color: TaupeFill Material: FoamWood Content: PlywoodUpholstery Content: LinenDimensions: 61.8 in. W x 3.9 in. D x 53.9 in. H Attaches to any standard size metal frame bedNumber of boxes this will ship in: 1StyleShabby Chic, TraditionalMaterialFabricTypeStandardAssemblyAssembly Required
